title: Documentation Frontmatter
description: YAML frontmatter schema for MDX documentation files

title.description: Page title (used in navigation and browser tab)

component.description: Reference to component id (must match a manifest)

editions.description: Override editions (defaults to manifest editions if not specified)

draft.description: If true, page is excluded from production build

required.title: Documentation must have a 'title' field
required.status: Documentation must have a 'status' field matching the component

properties.component: Component reference must be lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
properties.status: Status must be one of: experimental, alpha, beta, stable, deprecated
properties.editions: Editions must be array of: core, pro, enterprise
